confirm.info: The application "{{ id }}" for registration on the OneNet Flexibility Platform has been sent for verification. Its evaluation and further information will be sent to the address entered during the registration process.
confirm.error: An error occurred while sending the application for registration in the OneNet Flexibility Platform

reject.info: The application for access to the OneNet Flexibility Platform has been withdrawn.

confirmOption.success: The e-mail address has been removed from the registration process on the OneNet Flexibility Platform
confirmOption.error: An error occurred while removing the e-mail address from the registration from the registration process on the OneNet Flexibility Platform

rejectOption.success: The e-mail address has not been removed from the registration process on the OneNet Flexibility Platform
rejectOption.error: An error occurred while removing the account from the registration process on the OneNet Flexibility Platform

registration.invalidFiles: Enter the files required to register on the platform
registration.invalidForm: Please complete all required fields. Accept the files required to register on the platform.
registration.success: The application for registration on the platform has been sent for verification. Details of the application and its evaluation will be sent to the e-mail address provided
registration.error: There was an error sending the request
